txt.en: Arvaethor can be found in the village of Ethring.\n\nYou should speak with Arvaethor.
Arvaethor asks for you to follow him to the very heart of the caverns, deep inside the mountain.
Arvaethor can be found within the caverns of Nimrond.\n\nArvaethor asks for you to follow him to the very heart of the caverns, deep inside the mountain.
'We have defeated Drug√¢t! He will plague this land no more, thanks to your heroics. Nerzus escaped but I believe we will not see him again.'

'I thought they would have killed me, instead they were waiting for instructions on what to do with me. Instructions from who, is what I would like to know! Whoever is behind this growing army of Dead and Orcs, we must work together to stop them from amassing their forces and marching on Gondor!'
